project_id.description: The ID of the project to which this phase belongs

color.description: Phase's color in hexadecimal (defaults to project color)

notes.example: Due at the start of July. Paul to present

start_date.description: The start date of this phase which is either manually set or calculated from the earliest milestone, allocation, or logged time within this phase

end_date.description: The end date of this phase which is either manually set or calculated from the latest milestone, allocation, or logged time within this phase

budget_total.description: The budget amount for 'hours by phase' or 'fee by phase' project budgets

default_hourly_rate.description: The default hourly rate for fee-based budgets, the request also accepts a decimal `number`

non_billable.description: Is this phase billable? `0` = Billable, `1` = Non-billable

status.description: The status of the phase `0` = Draft, `1` = Tentative, `2` = Confirmed. Draft phases must belong to draft projects, tentative phase can belong to tentative or confirmed projects, confirmed phases must belong to confirmed projects

tentative.description: (**Deprecated** - see `status`): Is this phase tentative? `1` = Yes, `0` = No

active.description: Is this phase active or archived? `1` = Active, `0` = Archived

modified.description: Date this record was last modified
